name: Text Prison Escape
description:
How To Play: Find your way out of the prison! Follow the instructions and the press the keys specified on screen to progress through the game.

Info: This is a simple (crappy) game based off the excellent Unity course: Learn to Code by Making Games - Complete C# Unity Developer | Udemy

It's built in Unity, uses a finite state engine in the under the hood, has a simple soundtrack and an audio clip. Nothing special but I had a little fun with making the text interesting. Enjoy!
